name: Name
hero_description: Vienna Airport Taxi offers you comfortable and punctual 24/7 transfers at fixed prices. Book online now and enjoy a stress-free ride.
booking_section_title: How do I book an Airport Taxi?
step1_description: Select your desired direction - "From Airport" or "To Airport" Vienna-Schwechat. Our fixed price guarantee ensures transparency without hidden costs. With our modern vehicle fleet, we offer the highest comfort and exclusive service.
step2_description: Provide all important details: date, time, exact address, number of passengers and luggage. Optionally, you can add additional services like child seats, stopovers or return trips. Choose your preferred payment method (cash or card payment) and leave special requests in the comment field if needed.
step3_description: Your driver waits punctually at the agreed time in the arrival area of the airport at the "Information Service" or picks you up at your specified address at the agreed time and brings you stress-free to the terminal. After successful booking, you will immediately receive a confirmation email with all details of your trip.
reservation_same_day: For trips taking place until 10:00 PM on the same day, please reserve at least 3 hours in advance.
reservation_night: For trips taking place between 10:00 PM and 6:00 AM, please reserve at least 8 hours in advance.
turn_on_phone: Please turn on your mobile phone after landing.
driver_contact: Upon your arrival at Vienna Schwechat Airport, your driver will contact you by phone. If a name sign has been ordered, your driver will be waiting with it for you.
round_trip_info: For "Round Trip" bookings, our special package prices apply, offering you a discounted rate for the outbound and return journey.
contact_help: If you have difficulties with the form, you can contact us anytime via email, phone, or WhatsApp. We are happy to help you!
map_caption: Our driver waits at the information desk in the arrival area

return_trip_section.return_trip_question: When do you want to return?
return_trip_section.return_trip_info_message: We will pick you up punctually for your flight.
